name: Spinach
properties: Part of Daily Dozen - 2 servings of greens daily
Can be used fresh or cooked
benefits: Packed with nutrients while being very low in calories. Excellent source of vitamins and minerals. Supports weight loss through high nutrient density and low calorie content.
amount: Part of 2 servings of greens daily

quotes: 6 cups/150g coarsely chopped spinach or chard
Add the spinach, parsley, spring onions, mint, black pepper and Super-Charged Spice Blend to taste and continue to cook for 10 minutes.
